extendedInfo.description: Drawing on the cells and graphics dictation - a very exciting and useful exercise for children ages 5 to 10 years. This is the way of creativity, spatial imagination, coordination, attention and perseverance for children.The game provides five modes: 1. Lines - connect the dots in a sequence 2. Cells - paint with a pattern of squares and triangles 3. Graphic dictation - draw a line from the starting point for direction's (number of cells and direction).. 4. Free drawing of lines 5. Free drawing of squares and trianglesSupported languagesââ: English, German, Russian, Korean
